name: Saitama Deck
author: Werd Web Dev
description: Epic Duelsâ€“compatible deck for Saitama (One-Punch Man).

cards.name: Ground Smash
cards.rulesText: Deal 4 damage to each adjacent enemy and push them 2 squares away.

cards.name: Leaping Uppercut
cards.rulesText: Jump up to 5 squares; deal 3 damage to an adjacent enemy, then knock it 2 squares back.

cards.name: Consecutive Normal Punches
cards.rulesText: Deal 3 damage to up to three different adjacent enemies.

cards.name: One-Hit Wonder
cards.rulesText: Cancel an enemy attack against you; that enemy takes 2 damage.

cards.name: Hero Routine: Bargain Hunt
cards.rulesText: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck, keep 1, return the rest; then move +2 squares ignoring zones.

cards.name: Dramatic Entrance
cards.rulesText: Teleport to any space within 6 squares; if now adjacent to an enemy, deal 2 damage to it.

cards.name: Unbreakable Stance
cards.rulesText: Remove all negative conditions from yourself and gain Fortified.

cards.name: I Guess I'm Too Strong
cards.rulesText: The next damage you would take this turn is reduced to 0; the attacker is Stunned.

cards.name: Serious Side-Glance
cards.rulesText: Deal 3 damage to a visible enemy and make it Vulnerable.

cards.name: Overwhelming Presence
cards.rulesText: Deal 3 damage to all adjacent enemies, then teleport 3 squares.

cards.name: Lazy Sidestep
cards.rulesText: Move up to 3 squares; you are Stealthed until your next turn or you deal damage.

cards.name: Immovable Object
cards.rulesText: Gain a 6-point shield; push all adjacent enemies 2 squares away.

cards.name: Serious Punch
cards.rulesText: Deal 10 damage to one enemy; if it is defeated, push all other enemies you can see 3 squares away.

cards.name: Finishing Flick
cards.rulesText: Deal 5 damage to an adjacent enemy.
